blueprint.value: I got kicked out of _____ for _____

instructions: Judge fills in the first blank verbally (a place), then others write punchlines for the second blank.
Judge fills in the first blank verbally (a situation/topic), then others write punchlines for the second blank.

blueprint.value: Nothing ruins a first date faster than _____ followed by _____

instructions: Judge fills in the first blank verbally (an action/event), then others write punchlines for the second blank.

blueprint.value: My therapist said _____ but I heard _____

instructions: Judge fills in the first blank verbally (advice), then others write punchlines for what they 'heard' instead.

blueprint.value: I thought _____ was a good idea until _____

instructions: Judge fills in the first blank verbally (an action/plan), then others write what went wrong.

blueprint.value: The ick that ruins a 10/10 is when they _____ and then _____

instructions: Judge fills in the first blank verbally (a behavior), then others write what makes it worse.

blueprint.value: Scientists discovered that _____ is actually caused by _____

instructions: Judge fills in the first blank verbally (a phenomenon), then others write absurd causes.

blueprint.value: Breaking news: _____ has been cancelled due to _____

instructions: Judge fills in the first blank verbally (an event/thing), then others write ridiculous reasons.

blueprint.value: My villain origin story started with _____ and ended with _____

instructions: Judge fills in the first blank verbally (an event), then others write the dark conclusion.

blueprint.value: I didn't believe in _____ until I saw _____

instructions: Judge fills in the first blank verbally (a concept/thing), then others write what convinced them.
